html.title: Lesson 1: HTML Structure
html.description: Learn the basic structure of HTML and how to create your web page.

html.title: Lesson 2: Basic HTML Tags
html.description: Learn the fundamental HTML tags and how to use them to build your webpage.

html.title: Lesson 3: HTML Attributes (Style)
html.description: Learn how to use HTML attributes, especially the style attribute to customize your elements.

html.title: Lesson 4: ID and Class Usage
html.description: Learn the differences between ID and class and how to apply them in styling HTML elements.

html.title: Lesson 5: Block and Inline Elements
html.description: Understand the differences between block and inline elements and how to use them effectively.

html.title: Lesson 6: Text Formatting Tags (Bold, Italic, Underline)
html.description: Learn how to format text using bold, italic, and underline tags.

html.title: Lesson 7: Lists (Ordered and Unordered)
html.description: Learn how to create ordered and unordered lists in HTML.

html.title: Lesson 8: Creating Tables
html.description: Learn how to create tables in HTML and how to use them to organize data.

html.title: Lesson 9: Basic Form Elements
html.description: Learn how to create forms in HTML and understand the basic elements required for building forms.

html.title: Lesson 10: Semantic HTML Tags
html.description: Learn how to use semantic HTML tags to improve the structure and meaning of your webpage.

html.title: Lesson 11: Linking External Files (CSS, JavaScript, Font Awesome, Google Fonts)
html.description: Learn how to link external resources like CSS, JavaScript, Font Awesome, and Google Fonts to your webpage.
